name: Lucid (itch) (AngeloE28, ULTIMATON, shuckwaffles)
description:
#BillyBlueJamFactory
Trapped as a lab rat with the ability to shift between realities, forced to solve puzzles to escape room after room.

Rooms are not what they seem at first glance.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left click for interacting and picking up object 

Right click for Shifting between realities

P/Esc to pause and unpause

This was made for the Billy Blue Jam Factory game jam (2022)

Credits

  • Estoque, Angelo - Programmer
  • Hui, Clinton - Asset Artist
  • Sultana, Melinda - Environment Artist
